item.title: CH552/CH554 Development Guide - macOS
item.description: CH552G/CH554G Pinout (Get original SVG image from GitHub) # Pin Timer SPI PWM UART Timer Interrupt Touch USB ADC From Datasheet 1 P3.2 TXD1_ INT0 VBUS1 AIN3 P3.2/TXD1_/INT0/VBUS1/AIN3 2 P1.4 T2_/CAP1_ SCS TIN2 UCC1 AIN1 P1.4/T2_/CAP1_/SCS/TIN2/UCC1/AIN1 3 P1.5 MOSI PWM1 TIN3 UCC2 AIN2 P1.5/MOSI/PWM1/TIN3/UCC2/AIN2 4 P1.6 MISO RXD1 TIN4 P1.6/MISO/RXD1/TIN4 5 P1.7 SCK TXD1 TIN5 P1.7/SCK/TXD1/TIN5 6 RST T2EX_/CAP2_ RST/T2EX_/CAP2_ 7 P3.1 PWM2_ TXD P3.1/PWM2_/TXD 8 P3.0 PWM1_ RXD P3.0/PWM1_/RXD 9 P1.
